post:
Hello folks,

Here at FiberVolt, we strive to provide quality services at affordable prices, and to continue doing so, we've recently lowered all of our plans' prices. The new pricing plans can be seen [here](http://fibervolt.com/vps.php) and prices starts at the rate of $25/year or $5.50/month. Compare this to our previous price, as seen [here](http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:8cBWgJqKBx4J:fibervolt.com/vps.php+&cd=1&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=au) to check out how much you're saving!

For **$5.50**/month, you get:
**2** Cores Intel Xeon Sandy Bridge
**256MB** Dedicated DDR3 RAM
**512MB** Burst DDR3 RAM*
**30GB** RAID-Protected Diskspace
**150GB** Monthly Bandwidth
**1** IP Address
**1 Gbps** Port 
[Order Here](https://fibervolt.com/clients/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=0)

Chicago Test IP: 108.174.54.137
LA Test IP: 173.254.233.150

We'll be having a special promo for LEB users soon, so be sure to keep an eye out on the front page. 

Thank You.
